name: Dandelion
perennial_bloom: Bloom continuously but mainly in May and June
growth_rate: New plants take 8 to 15 weeks to reach the stage before they can bloom
growth_req: 1/4 inch deep and 8 inches apart per seedling
water_req: Water lightly. Dandelions can grow wildly if watered often.
sun_exposure: Full Sun ideally, but partial shade ok
